result.execSummary:
The defendant Nicole Margaret Benda was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Nicole Margaret Benda is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Nicole Margaret Benda was found guilty of Possession of Methamphetamine, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution to victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Concurrent with: 21CF270 and 22CF100

miscConds.notes:
Provide DNA sample within 30 days. 
Comply with any programming as recommended by the COMPAS assessment and/or Department of Corrections. 
1 day jail if probation is revoked.

filed by Atty Helgeson

10:36 AM Nicole Margaret Benda appears in Court.  Atty Philip A. Helgeson appeared in court, ADA Kaley Walker for the State of Wisconsin.  22CF74 and 22CF100. Court will now quash the stayed warrants. 10:36 AM Nicole Margaret Benda appears in Court.  Atty Philip A. Helgeson, ADA Kaley Walker for the State of Wisconsin.  ADA Walker: 22CF74 plea to Ct#2- 3 yrs probation; Court costs ($518) and 1 day credit.  dismiss Counts 1, 3-5.  22CF100 Ct# 5 and Ct# 6- 1 year probation- court costs (443.00), 3 days credit and dismiss Counts 1-4 and 7.Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights form is filed with the court; court reviews with Def. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and constitutional rights. Defendant understands charges, penalties and constitutional rights   Defendant pleas guilty to Ct#2 in 22CF74, Ct#5-6 in 22CF100. Counsel stipulates to factual basis for plea. Court finds a factual basis to accept the plea.  Court finds Defendant is freely, voluntarily and knowingly making plea and waiving constitutional rights. Court finds Defendant guilty of #2 in 22CF74 and Ct#5-6 in 22CF100. Court dismisses Ct #1, 3-5 in 22CF74 and Ct#1-4,7 in 22CF100.  ADA Walker and Atty Helgeson address sentencing -joint recommendation and are in compliance with victim rights. Court orders on Ct#2 in 22CF74 S/W 3 years probation concurrent with 21CF270 and 22CF74- court costs ($518),Comply with any programming as recommended by the COMPAS assessment and/or Department of Corrections. Provide DNA sample within 30 days. 1 day credit if probation is revoked. Court orders S/W 1 year probation on Ct#5-6  in 22CF100 concurrent with 21CF270 and 22CF74- court costs ($443), Comply with any programming as recommended by the COMPAS assessment and/or Department of Corrections. Provide DNA sample within 30 days. 3 days credit if probation is revoked. Defendant to report to DOC today. Appeal rights are given to the defendant. 10:59

9:32 AM Defendant Nicole Margaret Benda not in court.  Attorney Philip A. Helgeson in court for Nicole Margaret Benda.  Attorney Kaley Walker in court for State of Wisconsin. 21CF270, (SEH), 22CF74 and 22CF100 (STC). ADA Walker requests warrant based upon non appearance. Atty Helgeson: no information. Court: Def was present via zoom when matters were set. Authorizes a warrant but stays until September 7 at 3 in front of the court commissioner. Atty Helgeson does not need to appear on 9/7. If Defendant appears, matters to be reset, if not, warrants to be issued. 9:40
Return on warrant scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Status conference on August 31, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Information filed with the Court. DE waives further reading of the Information. NG on all Counts. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 2:22 pm.

2:16 PM Defendant Nicole Margaret Benda appears via zoom, Atty Philip A. Helgeson,  ADA Kaley Walker for State of Wisconsin. Includes 22CF100, 22CF74 (PH) and 21CF270 (STC). Court has received the waivers. DE wishes to waive. Court finds DE freely, intelligently and knowingly waives constitutional right to a PH. Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DE probably committed a felony. Court binds DE over for further proceedings.  Cases to follow 21CF270.
Status conference scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Status conference scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 09:30 am.

3:07 PM Defendant Nicole Margaret Benda appears in custody from Jail via video, Atty Nicholas M Zimmerman by phone for today only, ADA Kaley Walker appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Court informs Defendant of charges, and possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Waives reading. Court reviews DE's rights. ADA Walker is requesting a $10,000.00 SIBS w/conditions of AS & Not to Possess, no objection. Court so orders. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:17 pm.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 2, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
